Description.message: Allow users to share to Misskey from Twitter share button.

ConfirmShareMessage.message: We detected a Twitter share link. Do you want to share this with $INSTANCE_NAME$ ? (via browser extension Twishare to Misskey)

ShareButtonCaution.message: You can't use this button on Firefox.

InstanceNameFormLabel.message: Enter the server domain you want to share with. (Default is misskey.io .)

ShareButtonToggleLabel.message: Display a share button in the lower right corner on non-Misskey sites

ShareButtonOnMisskeyToggleLabel.message: Display a share button in the lower right corner on Misskey sites

ShareButtonHideFormLabel.message: Enter domains you don't want to display share button.

ShareButtonHideFormPlaceHolder.message: Enter domain(s) separated with a space.
